item.title: (UPDATED) Neopets Refresher By Jahuro - Undetectable :)
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

here you go this one works :

[code]{01001010 01100001 01101000 01110101 01110010 01101111}
{ _ _ }
{ | | | | }
{ | | __ | |_ _ _ _ __ ___ }
{ _ | |/ ` | ’ | | | | '/ _ \ }
{ | || | (| | | | | || | | | () | }
{ _/ _,|| ||_,|_| ___/ }
{ }
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{01001010 01100001 01101000 01110101 01110010 01101111}

{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Neopets Refresher

Author = Jahuro

Description = Random undetectable refresher for Neopets.

Version = 0.2

Date = 6/08/2007

Comments = All items in deposit box. Start logedin.

          = Have IE6 as defualt browser. Requires SRL.

/Script Info}

{---------------------------}{---------------------------}
{Changelog}
{V0.2 - added progress report, detection of when script gets a random and minor bugfix}
{V0.1 - first release of script}
{---------------------------}{---------------------------}

{---------------------------}{---------------------------}
{-----------------------}{SETUP}{------------------------}
{---------------------------}{---------------------------}

const
wwait = 5000; // Time it takes to load a page. (In milliseconds)

{---------------------------}{---------------------------}

var
noofrefreshes: Integer;
noofrandoms: Integer;
randombitm: Integer;
x, y : integer;

procedure progressreport;
begin
cleardebug;
Writeln('Worked For : ’ + TimeRunning)
Writeln(‘Refreshed ’ + IntToStr(noofrefreshes) + ’ times’);
Writeln(‘Received ’ + IntToStr(noofrandoms) + ’ random events’);
end;

procedure refresh;
begin
case Random(51) of
0: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/explore.phtml’);
1: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/index.phtml’);
2: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=586’);
3: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/poogleracing.phtml’);
4: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/rainbowfountain.phtml’);
5: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/faeriecity.phtml’);
6: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/darkfaerie.phtml’);
7: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/springs.phtml’);
8: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=40’);
9: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/faerieland/wheel.phtml’);
10: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/index.phtml’);
11: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/braintree.phtml’);
12: OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/battledome/battledome.phtml?battle_location=1&rnd=2088256748&rndno=455’);
13: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/index_fair.phtml’);
14: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/costumes.phtml’);
15: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/maze/maze.phtml’);
16: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=230’);
17: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/spet_masks.phtml’);
18: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=31’);
19: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/esophagor.phtml’);
20: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/colouring_page.phtml’);
21: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/gamegraveyard.phtml’);
22: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=763’);
23: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/witchtower.phtml’);
24: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/wheel/index.phtml’);
25: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/bagatelle.phtml’);
26: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=60’);
27: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/corkgun.phtml’);
28: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=30’);
29: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/strtest/index.phtml’);
30: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/scratch.phtml’);
31: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/ghostpets.phtml’);
32: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=59’);
33: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/halloween/coconutshy.phtml’);
34: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=131’);
35: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/worlds/index_kikolake.phtml’);
36: OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=67’);
37: OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=66’);
38: OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/worlds/kiko/glass_boat.phtml’);
39: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/pirates/index.phtml’);
40: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=82’);
41: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/pirates/piratepets.phtml’);
42: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/prehistoric/village.phtml’);
43: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=42’);
44: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/prehistoric/mediocrity.phtml’);
45: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/battledome/battledome.phtml?battle_location=4’);
46: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/desert/index.phtml’);
47: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=52’);
48: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=562’);
49: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/desert/shrine.phtml’);
50: OpenWebPage(‘http://neopets.com/desert/qasala.phtml’);
end;
noofrefreshes := noofrefreshes + 1;
end;

procedure loadrandombitm;
begin
randombitm := BitmapFromString2(False, ‘a79D7378DAD553CB128’ +
‘02008FC25285F1DCDE2FF3F295767EA520E351D94C3CA2CE8820A’ +
‘11510C19984D46672290A78C561C3000A780A8B5E9E41D52C82F5’ +
‘89C67F866871F91E9AD00E70D4C2839B28059CDC5D75DBE9C43D0’ +
‘6521C996A0726B353A0AB62B1FABA36FAFA07F476ADA53CE375D8’ +
‘D96A6F77E787D473DF06FA7BBFFFBD74FF758BD68FED8BFB3FF57’ +
‘CD4FBA07092’);
end;

procedure findrandom;
begin
if (FindBitmap(randombitm, x, y)) then
begin
status(’-!FOUND A RANDOM EVENT!-’);
noofrandoms := noofrandoms + 1;
end else
status(‘Random event not found.’);
end;

begin
loadrandombitm;
repeat
progressreport;
refresh;
wait(wwait + random(5000));
findrandom;
progressreport;
until (isfkeydown(10));
end.
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: (UPDATED) Neopets Refresher By Jahuro - Undetectable :)
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“jahuro, post:1, topic:130458”][center][size=36pt]Neopets Refresher By Jahuro[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Current Version : 0.2 (6/08/2007)[/size][/center]

[center]This is my first neopets script so please post comments/suggestions/progress reports.[/center]

[center]This was made with SCAR 3.11, so i suggest using that. :)[/center]


{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = Neopets Refresher
# Author      = Jahuro
# Description = Random undetectable refresher for Neopets.
# Version     = 0.1
# Date        = 5/08/2007
# Comments    = All items in deposit box. Start logedin. Have IE6 as default browser.
/Script Info}
{---------------------------}{---------------------------}
{Changelog}
{V0.2 - added progress report, detection of when script gets a random and minor bugfix}
{V0.1 - first release of script}
{---------------------------}{---------------------------}

[size=18pt]HOW TO DISABLE TABS:[/size]
Firefox:


1: Get the tab killer extension.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1938

To re-enable tabs:
1: Tools > addons > tabkiller > disable.
2: Restart firefox.

IE7:

1. Open IE7, go to Tools > Internet Options.

2. Click on the General tab.

3. In General tab, you will see a Settings button in the Tabs section. Click the Settings button.

4. A new dialog box is opened. Here, you have to uncheck the Enable Tabbed Browsing checkbox. Click Ok to close the dialog box.

5. Again click Ok to close the Internet Options box.

6. Restart Internet Explorer.


Progress reports:

This one is by me with the wait time set to 3000 miliseconds.

Worked For : 9 Minutes, and 51 Seconds
Refreshed 108 times
Received 2 random events


For history’s sake:
Neopets_Refresher_By_Jahuro_V0.1.scar (4.76 KB - downloaded 12 times.)[/quote]
Good job Jahuro see your getting better at scripts every day keep up the good work!

Read full topic
